modName: Bijin All-in-One - The Ordinary Women Patch
summary: Merged Bijin AIO .esp without npcs handled by The Ordinary Women.
descriptionHtml:
Good news! It's no longer 1-minute work*, USLEEP compatibility added.

Merged Bijin AIO .esp without npcs handled by The Ordinary Women.
Why you need it? To fix black/dark face bug (you still need original files).
Install Bijin's mods first, then install ordinary women with overwriting, then this mod.

It is 1-minute work*, everyone can do this by itself with TES5Edit or Merge Plugins utilities.
So, if you prefer Bijin's Irileth, you can easily remove her entries from The Ordinary Women instead.

The Ordinary Women: https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70547/?
USLEEP Patch (download standalone plugin): https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79112/?

Bijin's replacers:
https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63473/?
https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40038/?
https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71054/?
author: rxkx22

files.name: Bijin AIO - The Ordinary Women - USLEEP
